name: London
hint: The capital of the United Kingdom, situated on the River Thames

name: Paris
hint: France's capital, known as the City of Light, home to the Eiffel Tower

name: Berlin
hint: The capital of Germany, once divided by a famous wall during the Cold War

name: Rome
hint: Italy's capital, known as the Eternal City, center of the ancient Roman Empire

name: Madrid
hint: The capital and largest city of Spain, located in the center of the Iberian Peninsula

name: Moscow
hint: Russia's capital and largest city, home to the Kremlin and Red Square

name: Istanbul
hint: Turkey's largest city, straddling Europe and Asia across the Bosphorus strait

name: Amsterdam
hint: The capital of the Netherlands, famous for its canals, cycling culture, and museums

name: Vienna
hint: Austria's capital, a historic center of classical music and the former Habsburg Empire

name: Prague
hint: The capital of the Czech Republic, known for its Old Town Square and astronomical clock

name: Athens
hint: The capital of Greece, birthplace of democracy and home to the Parthenon

name: Stockholm
hint: Sweden's capital, spread across 14 islands where Lake Malaren meets the Baltic Sea
